gameelements

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameelements.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class for defining player. A player belongs to a RiskGame object, has amount of armies, can own several countries.

        public boolean ifForceExchange()
        This function is to judge if player must exchange cards with armies.
        返回:
